001package gbw.melange.common.mesh.constants;
002
003import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.VertexAttribute;
004import gbw.melange.common.mesh.formatting.IMeshDataTable;
005import gbw.melange.common.mesh.formatting.providers.SliceProvider;
006import gbw.melange.common.mesh.formatting.slicing.IFloatSlice;
007
008/**
009 * A VertexAttribute, however also the dedicated keytype for the {@link IMeshDataTable} multitype table.
010 * @param <T>
011 */
012public interface IVertAttr<T extends IFloatSlice> extends Comparable<IVertAttr<? extends IFloatSlice>> {
013    boolean equals(VertexAttribute vAttr);
014
015    VertexAttribute asVA();
016
017    int compCount();
018
019    String alias();
020
021    int usage();
022
023    /**
024     * What type can best represent each entry of some data under this attribute.
025     */
026    Class<T> repressentativeClass();
027    SliceProvider<T> representationProvider();
028}
